title: Create a component palette
content:
To create a component palette

  1. Click the gear icon and select Manage Component Palettes.
  2. Click the Create Component Palette icon.
  3. Provide information as described in the table below and then click Create.
  4. Click Done.
Field Description
Name A unique name for the component palette. No white space is permitted; all letters are changed to upper case for this value. This field can't be modified after a component palette has been created.
 
The palette Name uniquely identifies the palette not only on a single system but across all systems. During palette import, the import system will be searched for a palette with the same Name as the palette being imported. If a match is found, the existing palette on the system will be updated with the contents of the palette being imported.  This enables, for example, content to be created for the UD/UCMDB Palette on one system that will update the UD/UCMDB Palette of another system when it's imported.

The Name of the out of the box CMS Palette is hidden in the Manage Component Palettes dialog but is the same across all environments.
Display Name The name that displays, for the component palette.
Description The description for the component palette.
Image An image that displays for the component palette. Click Change Image. Choose the image you want, and click Select. Click Upload to add your own image. Supported file extensions include.jpg,.jpeg,.gif, and.png. The recommended image size is 256 by 256 pixels, and the image will be scaled to the appropriate size.

Related topics

  • Servicd design components
